admin_breaksDesc: Break time between matches and phases
admin_configureMatchFormat: Configure how matches are played in each phase
admin_confirmCancelTournament: Are you sure you want to cancel this tournament?
admin_consolationPending: Consolation matches are generated automatically when the corresponding round is completed.
admin_consolationRoundsDescription: Allows players eliminated in the first round to continue playing in a secondary bracket.
admin_couldNotLoadGroupStage: Could not load group stage data
admin_deleteMatchWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this match?
admin_earlyRoundsHint: Rounds before Semifinals (e.g. Round of 16, Quarterfinals)
admin_groupStageScheduleWillBeGenerated: Group stage schedule will be generated.
admin_matchDurationDesc: Average time per match in minutes
admin_maxTournamentsPerYearHint: Contact an admin to increase your tournament limit.
admin_parallelFinalsDesc: Play final and third place at the same time
admin_parallelSemifinalsDesc: Play both semifinals at the same time
admin_selectQualifiersAfter: You will select qualifiers in the next step.
admin_timeConfigDesc: Configure estimated times for the tournament
admin_tournamentWillAdvanceDirectly: Tournament will advance directly to Bracket stage.
admin_tournamentWillBeCancelled: The tournament will be permanently cancelled.
admin_useCreateButton: Use the Create button to start
auth_loginPrivacyNote: Your data will be securely synced with your Google account
auth_loginWelcome: Log in to sync your matches
auth_mustBeSignedIn: You must be signed in to sync
auth_playerNameDescription: This name will be used in your matches and rankings
bracket_consolationNotGenerated: Could not generate brackets - verify that the round (quarters or eighths) is complete
scoring_resetMatchDesc: All points and rounds will be reset.
sync_confirmTeamForEachMatch: Confirm your team for each match
sync_selectTeamBeforeSyncing: Select which team you played on before syncing to your account
tournament_abandonMatchDesc: Progress will be lost and others can play it
tournament_byeMatchNotice: This is a BYE match. The player advances automatically.
tournament_exitMessage: What do you want to do with this match?
tournament_inProgressWarning: There are matches in progress. Select them to continue with caution.
tournament_keyHint: Ask the organizer for the key
tournament_miniLeagueDescription: Tiebreaker calculated only with matches between tied players
tournament_pauseMatchDesc: You can resume later with the same key
tournament_tiesNotAllowedInElimination: Draws are not allowed in knockout rounds
admin_swissRoundsMinError: The number of rounds must be greater than the current round ( {n} )
tournament_forceFinishTooltip: End the match with the current score (whoever has the most points wins)
tournament_matchCompletedByAdminDesc: The organizer has ended this match due to time limits. The result has been saved.
admin_noMatchesFilter: There are no matches that match the filters
admin_noMatchesYet: There are no registered matches yet
rules_consolationExplanation: Players eliminated in the early rounds of the main draw continue to compete in secondary brackets to determine their final ranking. No one goes home after losing a single match in the final stage.
rules_goldSilverBrackets: It is divided into two brackets: **Gold** (qualified participants) and **Silver** (remaining participants), each with its own elimination round.
rules_goldSilverWithConsolation: It is divided into two brackets: **Gold** (qualified players) and **Silver** (remaining participants), both with consolation rounds to determine all positions
rules_multipleGroups: The participants are divided into {n} groups
rules_onePhaseIntro: The tournament is single elimination: all participants enter directly into an elimination bracket.
rules_qualifiersAdvance: The top-ranked teams from the group stage advance to the final stage
rules_rankingPoints: This tournament counts towards the **ranking** with category ** {tier} **. The winner receives ** {maxPoints} points** and the rest according to their final position.
rules_rankingNotEnabled: This tournament is friendly and does not award ranking points.
rules_singleBracketElimination: It is played in a single-elimination bracket. Whoever loses is eliminated.
rules_singleBracketWithConsolation: It is played in a single elimination bracket, but with consolation rounds that allow all final positions to be determined.
rules_singleGroup: All participants play in a single group
rules_swissRounds: {n} rounds with dynamic pairings are played
rules_tablesExplanation: The tournament has ** {n} playing tables**, allowing up to {n} matches to be played in parallel.
rules_twoPhaseIntro: The tournament consists of two phases: first a group stage and then a final knockout stage.
tournament_errorMatchCompleted: The match has already been completed
tournament_errorMatchInProgress: The game is already in progress on another device.
rules_tablesAllPlaySingles: With ** {players} players** and ** {tables} tables**, everyone can play at the same time ( {matches} matches per round).
rules_tablesAllPlayDoubles: With ** {players} pairs** and ** {tables} tables**, all can play at the same time ( {matches} matches per round).
rules_tablesSomeWaitSingles: With ** {players} players** and ** {tables} tables**, ** {matches} matches are played per round**. Some players wait between rounds.
rules_tablesSomeWaitDoubles: With ** {players} pairs** and ** {tables} tables**, ** {matches} matches are played per round**. Some pairs wait between rounds.
rules_tablesOddByeSingles: Since it is an odd number, in each round **1 player rests** (BYE).
rules_tablesOddByeDoubles: Since there is an odd number, in each round **1 pair rests** (BYE).
rules_roundRobinMultiGroup: The participants are divided into ** {n} groups** where **everyone plays against everyone**
rules_roundRobinSingleGroup: **Everyone plays against everyone** in a single group
rules_swissExplanation: **Swiss System** in ** {n} rounds**: each round pairs players with similar scores
update_newVersionAvailable: A new version is available. Update to get the latest improvements and fixes.
rules_groupClassificationByWins: Ranking: **2 pts** for a win, **1 pt** for a draw, **0 pts** for a loss
rules_groupTiebreakByPoints: In case of a tie: first **total of 20s**, then **head-to-head**
rules_groupTiebreakByWins: In case of a tie: first **head-to-head**, then **total of 20s**
rules_groupTiesAllowed: In round-robin matches, **ties may occur** (points tied at the end).
rules_roundsModeTiebreakNote: In rounds mode, if there is a tie at the end, **extra rounds** are played until one player wins by **2 points**.
rules_legendPg: Pg = First to win (e.g., Pg2 = first to win 2 games)
wizard_classificationWinsHint: Win = 2 pts, Draw = 1 pt, Loss = 0 pts
wizard_classificationPointsHint: Direct sum of games points scored
wizard_consolationDesc: Extra matches for positions 5th-16th in each bracket
wizard_keyHint: Players will use this code to join the tournament
wizard_pointsNote: From 5th place onwards, the points gradually decrease (minimum 1 point)
wizard_tierDescription: Ranking points depend on the category:
wizard_rankingHelp: It allows you to keep a player ranking based on tournament performance
wizard_someRest: Some will rest ( {max} play at the same time)
wizard_errorKeyFormat: The key must be exactly 6 alphanumeric characters (AZ, 0-9)
wizard_errorKeyInUse: The key " {key} " is already in use by another tournament
wizard_errorEditionRange: The edition must be a number between 1 and 1000.
wizard_errorMinTables: There must be at least 1 table
wizard_errorMinGroups: There must be at least 1 group
wizard_errorSwissMinRounds: The Swiss system requires at least 3 rounds
wizard_errorSelectTier: You must select a tournament category
wizard_warningDoublesEven: For doubles, an even number of participants is recommended.
rules_thirdPlaceMatch: The losers of the semi-finals play the 3rd and 4th place match.
rules_thirdPlaceMatchSplitDivisions: In each bracket (Gold and Silver), the losers of the semi-finals play the 3rd and 4th place match.
rules_noThirdPlaceMatch: There is no third-place match. The losers of the semi-finals are tied for 3rd-4th place.
wizard_thirdPlaceMatchDesc: The losers of the semi-finals play for 3rd and 4th place
admin_targetHasData: The target user already has tournaments or rankings
import_batchHint: One name per line or separated by commas
admin_canImportTournamentsHint: Allows importing historical tournaments (does not count towards quota)
wizard_liveHostDescription: This wizard guides you through creating a LIVE tournament as the organizer. Configure all phases (groups, knockouts), game formats, and rounds. Players can enter their results in real time from their devices.
import_description: This form allows you to register tournaments that were not managed live with the app. Enter the participants and results of the final stage (minimum). It is not necessary to include all the details such as individual rounds or 20s.
import_hasGroupStage: This tournament has a group stage
import_minParticipantsGroup: The group {n} needs at least 2 participants
import_minRoundsBracket: The bracket {label} needs at least one round
import_noMatches: There are no matches in this round
import_noPermissionDesc: You do not have permission to import historical tournaments.
import_noPermissionError: You do not have permission to import tournaments
import_noPermissionHint: Contact a SuperAdmin to obtain this permission.
import_participantExists: There is already a participant with this name.
import_userAlreadyAdded: This user has already been added
import_batchHintDoubles: One team name per line (e.g., The Flickers, Team Barcelona)
import_addRowHint: Click on '+ Add row' to begin
tournament_upcomingDescription: This tournament is confirmed and awaiting play.
wizard_upcomingHint: Do you just want to announce the tournament? You can complete the setup later.
wizard_saveAsUpcomingSuccess: Tournament saved. You can complete the setup later.
tournament_resultsComingSoon: The results will be available soon.
admin_transferDescription: {name} will be the new owner of the tournament.
common_translateSameLanguage: The text is already in your language.
tournament_isTestHint: Test tournaments do not appear in the public listing
admin_consolationNotNeeded: With 5 or fewer teams qualified, the consolation phase is not necessary since the main draw determines all positions.
admin_noBrokenMatches: There are no matches to fix.
admin_cannotDeleteHasOwnership: It cannot be deleted: transfer ownership first
admin_collaboratorWillBeRemoved: You will be automatically removed as a contributor.
admin_disqualifyConfirm: Are you sure you want to disqualify {name} ?
admin_disqualifyWarning: The participant will not appear in the final ranking and will not receive ranking points.
import_groupStageFormat: Format: Group name on one line, followed by participants as Name,Points,20s
import_pasteGroupDataHint: Paste the results from the group stage. Each group begins with its name, followed by the participants in the format: Name,Points,20s (one participant per line). Groups are separated by a blank line.
import_skipGroupStageHint: If the tournament does not have a group stage, click here.
import_mustParseFirst: You should analyze the data before continuing.
import_pasteKnockoutDataHint: Format: [Bracket Name] on one line, then phase name (Semifinals, Final...), and matches as Player1,Player2,PointsA,PointsB
import_noBracketsFound: No brackets were found in the text
import_unknownParticipant: " {name} " is not in the list of participants
import_unknownParticipantsHint: These names do not match the participants in Step 2. Correct the names or go back to add them.
import_hasUnknownParticipants: There are {count} participant(s) in the results that are not listed in Step 2. Correct the names before continuing.
wizard_bulkEntryTitle: or add in batch (registered and unregistered)
wizard_bulkHelpDoubles: One couple per line (stage name optional):
wizard_bulkErrorIsRegistered: He's already registered. Add him from the user search.
stats_loginRequired: Log in to view your statistics
stats_noMatchesYet: You don't have any registered matches yet
wizard_bulkErrorsFound: There are errors in the list of participants
join_alreadyAccepted: You have already accepted this invitation
join_alreadyUsed: This invitation has already been used
join_cannotJoinOwnInvite: You cannot join your own invitation
join_successDesc: You will play as {role} in this {gameType} game. The result will be saved to your history.
invite_descSinglesOpponent: Your opponent must scan this QR code to join the game. Their stats will also be saved.
invite_descDoublesMyPartner: Your teammate must scan this QR code to join the game.
invite_descDoublesOpponent: The main player of the opposing team must scan this QR code to join.
invite_descDoublesOpponentPartner: The opposing teammate must scan this QR code to join.
